question: You know, I always thought that when it rained, the water just fell straight into my glass!
Oh really? I always thought it took a detour through a super cool water park, with slides and filters!
Why is your fish swimming in a coffee filter?
He's training to become a water treatment plant operator!
Why do you have a mini roller coaster model?
It's not a roller coaster, it's a model of a water treatment process! The water goes on a wild ride!
I got a vacuum cleaner for my birthday. I've been using it to clean the air outside.
Huh, a DIY air pollution control system. Innovative but not quite effective.
You know, I started wearing this gas mask around to make a fashion statement.
Or it could be your personal air pollution control device. Either way, it's a look!
Why are you hugging that tree so tightly?
I'm trying to thank it for its air pollution control services. Photosynthesis, my friend!
Why are you adding coffee grounds to your garden?
Well, the soil needed a pick-me-up too!
Look at this! My plants are growing crooked.
Maybe they're just leaning into the soil remediation process.
Why are there so many worms in your yard?
They're my tiny soil remediation crew. Working 24/7!
You're separating your trash into three bins?
Yep, one for recycling, one for compost, and one for my collection of broken pencils.
Why are you throwing your old jeans in the compost?
It's called fashion recycling, darling!
What's that weird sculpture in your backyard?
Oh, that's my trash-art installation. I call it 'Waste Not, Want Not'.
What's with all the plants in your house?
Just my new sustainable design decor, I call it 'jungle chic'.
Why are you carrying a wind turbine?
I'm installing it on my car. Who needs gas when you have wind?
Why are you wearing a solar panel as a hat?
It's called fashion, sweetie. Plus, I can charge my phone on the go.
Why are you counting birds in your backyard?
I'm assessing the environmental impact of my new bird feeder. The sparrows love it, but the crows... not so much.
Why are you measuring the height of those trees?
I'm seeing if my singing in the shower has any environmental impact. Plants love music, right?
Why are you writing a report on squirrels?
I’m assessing the environmental impact of leaving nuts out. Turns out, it’s led to a major population boom!
Why are you wearing a hazmat suit to take out the trash?
Well, you never know what dangerous things you could encounter in there!
What's with the tongs and safety goggles?
I'm just getting rid of these expired canned beans. I take my hazardous waste management very seriously!
Why do you have a mini fire extinguisher next to your garbage bin?
I read that old batteries can spontaneously combust. I'm just being proactive about my hazardous waste management!
Why are you holding an umbrella indoors?
I'm doing my part to conserve water, I'm catching the air conditioner's condensation!
Why are you drinking water from a cactus?
It's called being resourceful with water resources. Plus, it's very hydrating!
Why is your backyard full of water?
I'm creating my own little reservoir for future water needs!
Why are you giving that tree a ticket?
It's not recycling its leaves properly. Environmental law is everyone's responsibility!
Why are you running for mayor?
So I can enact a city-wide policy that everyone should carpool with a kangaroo!
Why are you whispering in the park?
I'm lobbying the squirrels to reduce their acorn consumption!
Why is your house covered in salad?
I've taken green building to the next level!
Why are you painting your roof green?
I'm misunderstood the concept of green building!
What's with the windmill on your house?
It's my new eco-friendly blender, part of my green building strategy!
Why are you throwing baking soda into the lake?
Trying to neutralize the acidity. It's environmental chemistry in action!
Why are you stirring your coffee with a thermometer?
Just checking how much heat my morning brew contributes to global warming!
Why are you pouring water over your car?
I'm testing the pH of the rain. It's not just about cleanliness, it's science!
Why is there a mini windmill on your backpack?
It's my portable renewable energy system. Keeps my phone charged and my hair windswept!
Why are you strapping solar panels to your cat?
Just trying to see if Fluffy can generate enough power to charge my laptop!
Why are you running on the treadmill with all those wires?
I'm creating my own renewable energy system. The more I run, the more I can binge-watch my shows later!
Why are you installing a bubble around your drum set?
It's my new noise pollution control system. Now I can play at 3am without disturbing the neighbors!
Why are you wearing earmuffs in the summer?
They're not earmuffs, they're noise pollution controllers. Now I can focus on my inner thoughts instead of the city noise!
Why are you building a wall around your garden?
It's a noise pollution control system. Now the birds can sing without competing with the traffic noise!
Why are you swapping all our light bulbs for plants?
It's my newest climate change mitigation strategy! Photosynthesis instead of electricity!
Why are you tying balloons to your car?
It's my climate change mitigation plan! If the car floats, we don't need gas!
Why are you planting a tree in the middle of the living room?
Climate change mitigation, my friend! Who needs air conditioning when you have natural shade?
Why are you carrying a beaver into the bathroom?
Ecosystem restoration! I'm starting with the bathtub. It needs a dam!
Why are you sprinkling bird seed on your laptop?
Ecosystem restoration! Digital birds need to eat too!
Why are you putting fish in the water cooler?
Ecosystem restoration! The office needs more biodiversity!
